Description.Text: Facilities Travellers can enjoy a pleasant stay in one of the 187 rooms. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the resort. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, a fan and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is among the standard features of most rooms. Guests will also find a fridge included as standard. Little extras, including a telephone, a TV, a radio, a CD player, a DVD player and an alarm clock, contribute to a great stay. The bathrooms have a shower, a bathtub and a hot tub. Special family rooms are available for families with children. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. A range of options are available, including tennis, golf, a gym, a spa, massage treatments and hydrotherapy applications.
